elements.name: User navigates to Computers page, filters by Desktop Computers, and adds a product to the cart

steps.name: I have to open chrome browser
User is on the Micro Center home page
User selects "Gaming Desktop " from the category filters
User selects G453 Gaming PC from the list
I click on Add To Card
I click on checkout as guest
The product should be added to the cart successfully

name: Computers Page Functionality on Micro Center

elements.name: Add the first PC part listed to the cart

steps.name: I have to open chrome browser
I am in Microcenter home page
I am on the Micro Center PC Parts page
I click on the first intel CPUS item
I click on add to card
